org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.io.dto.chat

Class ChatMessage<T extends ChatMessageAuthor,U extends TextChannel,V extends ChatEmoticon>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.io.dto.chat.ChatMessage<T,U,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscordChatMessage, TwitchChatMessage

    public class ChatMessage<T extends ChatMessageAuthor,U extends TextChannel,V extends ChatEmoticon>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Formatable
    A generic message that is send in a chat

        public java.util.List<V> getEmoticons()
        Note: Not all chat inputs support emoticons. If not supported this list will always be empty
        Returns:
